hero.title: Ask Luna. Discover the smartest next step for your build.
hero.description: Luna is Lunim Studio's AI guide. Share your goals, talk through constraints, and within minutes you'll get a human-ready plan—voice, text, PDF, and a warm invitation to the team when you're ready.

preview.quote: Hi! I'm Luna, your guide at Lunim Studio. Tell me about your project and I'll help you find the perfect next steps.
preview.supportingText: Voice-first, privacy-aware, and always ready to hand off to the Lunim team.

whySection.heading: Every conversation ends with a confident plan
whySection.body: Instead of waiting for a scoping call, Luna helps product and marketing leads reach clarity faster. Switch between voice and text at any point, save your plan, or keep it totally confidential.

features.title: Voice-first guidance
features.description: Speak freely and Luna will listen, clarify, and respond with natural voice or text—whichever feels right for you.

features.title: Personalized plans
features.description: In a few minutes, Luna synthesizes your goals into a sequence of concrete next steps the Lunim team can act on immediately.

features.title: Built-in privacy
features.description: Choose an on-the-record session or switch to confidential mode so nothing is saved—perfect for early, sensitive projects.

flowSection.heading: Start the conversation whenever inspiration hits.
flowSection.body: Luna keeps track of every message, surfaces clarifying questions, and nudges you to a human teammate when a deeper dive makes sense.

steps.title: Share where you are
steps.detail: Describe your idea, product state, or challenge in your own words.

steps.title: Luna clarifies
steps.detail: Expect two thoughtful follow-up questions so we can scope work precisely.

steps.title: Review the plan
steps.detail: Luna presents a prioritized, multi-step plan plus a nudge toward a Lunim consult.

steps.title: Take action
steps.detail: Download the branded PDF, replay the summary, or open a call with the team.

closingSection.heading: Spin up your plan with a single tap
closingSection.body: Whether you're refining an existing roadmap or exploring a fresh build, Luna captures your thinking, recommends next actions, and preps everything for a seamless handoff to Lunim.
